channel.title: [PI]Hitting NPC
channel.description: Scratch my last post, I don't really care if it can hit thru protect melle or not. what I really need to know, if you guys can help, is how can I make an NPC hit something other than a 0? like say..power it up so it won't hit just 0's and 1's or 2's.. so maybe it hits 10's or 20's..not entirely sure how to do this though, anyone help?

item.title: [PI]Hitting NPC
item.dc:creator: @outrageouscape outrageouscape
item.description:
@outrageouscape wrote:


That's what the numbers mean in order, So the 1 means if it can move or not.

That’s what the numbers mean in order, So the 1 means if it can move or not.

Read full topic

item.title: [PI]Hitting NPC
item.dc:creator: @outrageouscape outrageouscape
item.description:
@outrageouscape wrote:


The 21 is the Maxhit
The 100 is the attack level
The last 100 is the strength level 

Just change those numbers and It should start hitting more

The 21 is the Maxhit
The 100 is the attack level
The last 100 is the strength level

Just change those numbers and It should start hitting more

Read full topic
